entries.title: Who's up for a bit of WW2 Tactics? Second Front releases this week
entries.description: It's a rhetorical question, some of you are always up for this.

entries.title: 17-year-old D&D Online is getting a 'mini expansion' this year
entries.description: Always gives me warm fuzzy feelings to see old MMOs get new updates.

entries.title: Slay some demons with the power of rock in Power Chord's full release
entries.description: A band is pretty much a party of fantasy adventurers, when you think about it.

entries.title: Bungie reveals technical culprit behind Destiny's vanished triumphs and 20-hour downtime
entries.description: The studio had attempted some player account maintenance with a misconfigured dev tool.

entries.title: Wordle hint and answer today: Let's solve #588, January 28
entries.description: Wordle today: The solution and a hint for Saturday's puzzle.
